document_data.mainbody:
Elence Fielding was a merchant of the village of Imnesvale in the Umar Hills in the late 14 century DR.
Elence was an elf who wore wizards robes. She had a fair skin and brown hair.
In the , the village of Imnesvale faced a slew of disappearances, and locals did not hesitate to blame the legendary Umar Witch. Elence sold her goods, including mundane armor, weapons, some jewelry, and an occasional potion of fire resistance. However, her business suffered from strife, and the supplier mercantile company hadnt been bringing goods in. Unlike the villagers who blamed the Umar Witch and some fellow merchants who blamed nearby ogres, Elence believed that the reason behind disappearance was simple â€“ wolves.
